Package com.kremerk.Sqlite

Class Summary
ColumnExpression A expression to allow for custom columns and functions to be called as part of a "select" portion of a sql statment.
DataConnectionManager This is the main class used for connecting to the SQLite database.
JoinExecutor  
Relationship  
SqlExecutor<T> Used to continue a SqlStatement to interact with the database.
SqlStatement The main way to interact with the database.
WhereExecutor<T> Used to specify an equality in a where statement.
 

Enum Summary
JoinExecutor.JoinType User to represent various join types for a database.
Relationship.RelationshipType  
StatementParts An enum of the different parts of a sql statement.
StatementType An enum of the supported sql statement parts.
 

Exception Summary
DataConnectionException An exception that is thrown when something goes wrong with interaction with the database.
